title: Pixel 2XL disconnects phone call after 5 minutes?
content:
Hello, 
My Pixel 2XL always disconnects my phone calls after 5 minutes. I read through prior forums which stated that it was an issue with "Advanced calling" that was turned on. When I would turn advanced calling off, the phone did not disconnect my calls after 5 minutes while on Mobile data. 

However, when I was connected to wifi, my phone calls always disconnected after 5 minutes, even if the "Advanced calling" feature was turned off.

I have tried to restart my phone, restart on safe mode, and toggle the advanced calling feature on and off. My phone calls always disconnect.

Please what is the issue here?
